name: Healthy Breaded Chicken
author: Alex Persson
method: Slice chicken breasts into tenders (about 1/3 cuts lengthways, try to keep even thickness).
Mix together panko, parsley, paprika, and oregano on a plate. Mix olive oil, mayo, onion and garlic powder with salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken to bowl and coat in mayo-oil mixture.
Then roll each chicken tender on plate of panko to cover in breadcrumbs. Set on baking paper on a baking sheet.
Spray tenders with low cal cooking spray. Cook in the oven for 20 minutes, turning once.
Rest for 5 mins and then serve with lemon wedges.
